snippet: Kidnappers stabbed the engineer to death on Thursday as soldiers unaware of the hostage’s presence raided a home in northern Nigeria, officials said.
abstract: Kidnappers stab a captive German engineer to death as soldiers unaware of the hostage’s presence raid a home in northern Nigeria, five months after the man’s abduction by members of a group linked to Al Qaeda.
lead_paragraph: Kidnappers stabbed the engineer to death on Thursday as soldiers unaware of the hostage’s presence raided a home in northern Nigeria, officials said.

headline.main: Nigeria: Kidnapped German Killed During Raid on Suspected Terrorists
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Kidnapped German Killed During Raid on Suspected Terrorists
